Articles.Content:
> 
> Plot twisting: the society who owns physic servers of Squad has shut them down because of black smoke

nooo! the systems runs on black magic smoke! If you break it, black magic smoke will rise an the system will not run anymore!

GAAAAAH!!!!!!

Yaknow what would be bad? We update our games, only to find that 1.0 is a giant prank....... THE HORROR!

All the Hype! It's overwhelming!

Overwhelming for the weak that is.

> 
> 500 what? I just logged in.

Pages. Or server error 502. Take your pick. Either or both.

Maybe it's been asked (I haven't checked the previous 484 pages), but I wonder how many who (legitimately) own the game are also going to download the demo. I might just do that my self lol. Also I think once it's offically out, being as the demo will also be 1.0, I'll likely post it on my FB (separate from the "OMG 1.0 is here" post lol).

On a side note, another thing I just thought of (which also might have been mentioned already) it would be neat if Squad had an app that would generate notifications right as the game is officially released. How ever with the site still (as of 5 minutes ago) down, the first clue to the possible imminent release of 1.0 will be the site coming back up.
MmHHhyPpPMmnhghppmM (That was "Hype" with a mouth full... Lunch time here....)
Just cleared out all my mods and saves for 1.0!

> 
> All the Hype! It's overwhelming!
> Overwhelming for the weak that is.

Hype, or hype not. There is no try.
ALMOST AT THAT MAGICAL 500 PAGES!! get some more of dat hype

> 
> Onwards
> For victory!

and red dawns?!?! Raaaargh~!
